definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Normal saline in the same volume was perfused in the ischemiareperfusion group and sham operation group.
sentences.chinese: 缺血再灌注组和假手术组灌等体积的生理盐水。

sentences.english: In the second group Benidipine, Hydrochloride was used for 6 weeks.
sentences.chinese: 各小组分别用生理盐水或盐酸贝尼地平灌胃6周。

sentences.english: The normal saline was injected into the left knee joints as the control.
sentences.chinese: 左侧膝关节腔注射生理盐水，作为对照侧。

sentences.english: Use saline nasal spray as directed throughout the day.
sentences.chinese: 按指导用生理盐水制成鼻喷雾，全天使用。

sentences.english: Chinese angelica parenteral solution was replaced by normal saline in control group.
sentences.chinese: 对照组给予生理盐水代替当归注射液治疗。

sentences.english: The rats of normal control group were also subcutaneously injected the saline solution with the same dosage.
sentences.chinese: 正常对照组同法皮下注射相应剂量生理盐水。

sentences.english: Conclusion The brain blood flow quickens significantly after exchange transfusion using NS in treatment of NP.
sentences.chinese: 结论生理盐水换血后NP患儿脑血流明显加快。

sentences.english: What's the difference between saline and silicone breast implants?
sentences.chinese: 那么，硅胶和生理盐水，到底有什么不同？

sentences.english: Compared with methylprednisolone, hydrogen-rich saline had a similar therapeutic effect.
sentences.chinese: 与甲强龙相比，氢生理盐水具有类似疗效。

sentences.english: CG and ADG gave the same dose of Sodium Chloride.
sentences.chinese: 对照组与AD模型组则给予等量的生理盐水灌胃。

sentences.english: The rats in the normal control group and bleomycin model group were injected with the same volume of saline.
sentences.chinese: 正常对照组和博来霉素模型组注射等体积生理盐水。

sentences.english: First, gently clean the amputated part with water or saline.
sentences.chinese: 首先，使用清洁水或生理盐水小心清洗断指。

sentences.english: Negative control group only fed with PSS part. aeq, Qd.
sentences.chinese: 阴性对照组仅以等量生理盐水灌胃。

sentences.english: Traumatic arthritis models were established in D antu and NS groups.
sentences.chinese: 丹菟注射液组及生理盐水组建立创伤性关节炎模型。

sentences.english: Therapy should consist of intravenous infusion of warm isotonic saline.
sentences.chinese: 治疗应包括温生理盐水静脉滴注。

definition: Yanshui town in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
to drip into/to transfuse/to percolate/to drip feed/fig. to instill
variant of 棉籤|棉签[mian2 qian1]/cotton swab
